about.description_header_en: Tasty blend of Portuguese and Vietnamese quality food and atmosphere

about.description_header_pt: Saborosa mistura de comida e atmosfera de qualidade Portuguesa e Vietnamita

about.description_en: Tertúlias is a cozy and inviting restaurant located in the picturesque town of Portimão.
Our menu features a variety of delicious and authentic dishes from Vietnam and Portuguese, including specialties that are sure to please your palate.
Alongside our traditional Vietnamese fare, we also offer a wide selection of bubble tea, fruit tea and coffee, as well as delicious Portuguese dishes.
Our specialty dish of local is the famous Francesinha. Come experience our warm and friendly atmosphere enjoy a delicious meal at Tertúlias.

about.description_pt: O Tertúlias é um restaurante acolhedor e convidativo localizado na pitoresca vila de Portimão.
O nosso menu apresenta uma variedade de pratos deliciosos e autênticos do Vietname e de Portugal, incluindo especialidades que certamente agradarão ao seu paladar.
Juntamente com nossa tradicional culinária vietnamita, também oferecemos uma ampla seleção de chás de bolhas, chá de fruta e café, bem como deliciosos pratos portugueses.
Nosso prato especial de é a famosa Francesinha. Venha experimentar nosso ambiente caloroso e amigável desfrutar de um delicioso refeição nas Tertúlias.

starters.name: Phống tôm
starters.description_en: Tapioca flour is taken from theroots of the cassava plant with a little baking powder added.

starters.name: Dim sum
starters.description_en: The crust is made from wheat flour, dumpling flour, tapioca flour, the fillling can be varied including meat, shrimps, vegetables, fruits, spices.

main_dishes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
main_dishes.description: Pasta with bacon, egg yolks, and Parmesan cheese

main_dishes.name: Chicken Parmesan
main_dishes.description: Breaded chicken breast, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, served with spaghetti
